mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL( CONCAT(SUBSTR(B.NEW_PROD_ID, 1, 11), LPAD((SUBSTR(B.NEW_PROD_ID, 12, 5)) + 1, 5, '0')) , CONCAT('PRO', DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d'), '00001') ) AS NEW_PROD_ID FROM ( SELECT MAX(A.PROD_ID) AS NEW_PROD_ID FROM PRO1100 A WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.PROD_ID LIKE CONCAT('PRO', DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d'), '%') ) B

SELECT A.PROD_ID, A.PROD_NM, A.GUBUN, A.ITEM_ID, B.ITEM_NM, A.SUB_ITEM, A.PROD_SUP_PRICE, A.PROD_SUP_YN, A.PROD_OFL_PRICE, A.RENTAL_PRICE, A.RENTAL_PRICE_EXTN, A.PROD_PAY_CODE FROM PRO1100 A LEFT JOIN PRO1000 B ON B.ITEM_ID = A.ITEM_ID WHERE PROD_ID = #{prodId}

SELECT A.PROD_ID, A.GUBUN, A.PROD_NM, A.ITEM_ID, A.SUB_ITEM, A.PROD_SUP_YN, A.PROD_SUP_PRICE, A.PROD_OFL_PRICE, A.RENTAL_PRICE, A.RENTAL_PRICE_EXTN, A.PROD_PAY_CODE, A.SUP_ID, A.PROD_SYM, A.PROD_WEIG, A.PROD_QTY, A.PROD_DETAIL, A.TAX_INFO_CD, A.USE_CD, A.PROD_IMG_ATTR, A.PROD_STATE_CODE, A.PROD_STOP, A.PROD_STOP_DTM, A.REG_DTM, A.REG_USR_ID, A.REG_USR_IP, A.MODIFY_DTM, A.MODIFY_USR_ID, A.MODIFY_USR_IP FROM PRO1100 A WHERE PROD_ID = #{prodId}

SELECT ITEM_ID , ( CASE WHEN SUB_ITEM IS NULL THEN ITEM_NM WHEN SUB_ITEM = '' THEN ITEM_NM ELSE CONCAT(ITEM_NM, '(', SUB_ITEM,')') END ) as ITEM_NM, ITEM_TYPE_CD AS GUBUN, USE_YEAR, USE_NUM, NON_OVRLAP FROM PRO1000 WHERE USE_CD = '01' AND ITEM_TYPE_CD = #{gubun}

SELECT A.PROD_ID , A.PROD_NM , A.GUBUN , A.ITEM_ID , B.ITEM_NM , B.SUB_ITEM , B.ITEM_TYPE_CD , (SELECT SUB_CD_NM FROM CMM1100 WHERE MST_CD = 'PRO00001' AND SUB_CD = B.ITEM_TYPE_CD) AS ITEM_TYPE_NM , B.USE_YEAR , B.USE_NUM , (CASE WHEN A.PROD_SUP_PRICE != '' AND A.PROD_SUP_PRICE IS NOT NULL THEN A.PROD_SUP_PRICE ELSE 0 END) AS PROD_SUP_PRICE , A.PROD_OFL_PRICE , A.RENTAL_PRICE , A.RENTAL_PRICE_EXTN , A.PROD_PAY_CODE , A.SUP_ID , C.SUP_NM , A.PROD_SYM , A.PROD_WEIG , A.PROD_QTY , A.PROD_DETAIL , A.PROD_COLOR , A.PROD_SIZE , A.PROD_SIZE_DETAIL , A.USE_CD , A.PROD_IMG_ATTR , A.PROD_STATE_CODE , (SELECT SUB_CD_NM FROM CMM1100 WHERE MST_CD = 'PRO00002' AND SUB_CD = A.PROD_STATE_CODE) AS PROD_STATE_NM , A.REG_DTM , A.REG_USR_ID , A.REG_USR_IP , A.MODIFY_DTM , D.REG_DTM AS PPC_REG_DTM , D.PPC_ID , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PRO1103 WHERE DEL_YN = 'N' AND STATE_CD = '01' AND PPC_ID = D.PPC_ID) AS CNT FROM PRO1100 A LEFT JOIN PRO1000 B ON ( A.ITEM_ID = B.ITEM_ID) LEFT JOIN SUP1000 C ON ( A.SUP_ID = C.SUP_ID) INNER JOIN PRO1102 D ON A.PROD_ID = D.PROD_ID WHERE A.USE_CD = '01' AND A.PROD_STATE_CODE = '03' AND B.USE_CD = '01' AND D.DEL_YN = 'N'
AND D.ENT_ID = #{entId}
